entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the evening and ending overnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
